sentences.sContent: Your eidetic memory must be a blessing.
sentences.sContent_eng: Your eidetic memory must be a blessing.
sentences.sCn: 你异常清晰的记忆，是一种祝福。

sentences.sContent: When he was twelve he’d learned that he’d been born with an eidetic memory.
sentences.sContent_eng: When he was twelve he’d learned that he’d been born with an eidetic memory.
sentences.sCn: 当他还是十二岁的时候，他知道他天生有幅异常清晰的记忆。

trans.tranOther: (of visual, or sometimes auditory, images) exceptionally vivid and allowing detailed recall of something previously perceived: thought to be common in children
